title: Log Barn Natural Firelighters (Box of 500). Natural Fire Lighters for Wood Burners, Pizza Ovens, Open Fires. BBQ Lighters, Fire Starters for Log Burners – Genuine Log Barn Fire Wood & Eco Firelighters
features: ALL-PURPOSE 100% NATURAL FIRELIGHTERS – Perfect for use with kindling to spark the warmth of a cosy stove or open fire, these wood wool firelighters are made from untreated wood shavings and dipped in wax for a quick light without liquid chemicals

SAFE FOR OUTDOOR COOKING - Odourless and non-toxic, these sustainable natural fire lighters are an eco-alternative to BBQ fire lighter gel. Use them year-round to ignite wood, briquettes or charcoal in your pizza oven, fire pit, campfire or grill

10 MINUTE BURN TIME - Capable of getting a fire going with or without kindling, these naturally efficient fire starters burn for up to 10 minutes, igniting tinder, coal or firewood cleanly and quickly, so you enjoy sustained warmth indoors or outside

CLEAN & EASY TO USE - Simply pop 1 firelighter on top of your kindling and light. Add more kindling to fuel the fire once lit (avoid holding firelighter while igniting). Use 2-3 firelighters if starting kiln dried logs or heat logs without kindling

GENUINE LOG BARN QUALITY FUELS - Established in 2009 to keep your fire burning brightly, our reliably sourced natural products include firewood logs and kindling wood certified as Ready to Burn in compliance with 2020 Air Quality Regulations
description: Product Description All Log Barn wood wool firelighters are made from untreated wood shavings and dipped in a sustainable, natural wax for an immediate light, ensuring quick and hassle-free fire starting every time. All our natural fire lighters are touchably clean, guaranteeing a convenient, mess-free experience without any sticky fingers or unpleasant odours. Whether you're toasting marshmallows over a campfire or baking pizzas in a wood-fired oven, Log Barn natural firelighters are 100% non-toxic, perfect for cooking. Log Barn kiln-dried firewood logs for wood burners and open fires are certified as 'Ready to Burn,' complying with the 2020 Air Quality Regulations. This ensures they have a very low moisture content of 20% or less, guaranteeing an efficient, clean burn. Our premium smokeless coals and briquettes offer an efficient and cost-effective solution for heating your home. Light them together in a multi-fuel stove for maximum heat and a longer lasting fire. Perfect for log burners, stoves, fire pits, pizza ovens, BBQs and more, our kindling and firelighters are responsibly sourced and harvested from well-managed woodlands to support environmental sustainability.
